lead_paragraph: I was turning right off of Rajpath, just next to Rashtrapati Bhavan, on my way to the New Delhi office when I was jolted by a rude thump on the back of my car.
snippet: A writer discovered that seeking compensation from a routine traffic accident can turn into a labyrinthine process when it involves the police....

headline.main: Underpaid and Uninsured, Delhi Police Shrug Off Crashes

abstract: A writer discovered that seeking compensation from a routine traffic accident can turn into a labyrinthine process when it involves the police.
